abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project consists of three
            interrelated components which should enable the Government
            to firm up its investment program in water supply and
            sewerage as well as continuing the overall improvement in
            the management of the sector.  The first component contains:
            (i) feasibility studies and project preparation work for
            water supply improvements in the governorates of Daqahliya
            and Damietta along with sewerage systems in these two
            governorates and the governorate of Beheira.  (ii) Secondly,
            there are organizational, management and financial studies
            for the provision of water supply and sewerage services in
            the project area as well as assistance in implementing the
            recommended institutional proposals.  Finally, the project
            provides for; (iii) design and engineering work for the
            projects to be prepared under (i) above.
